Voice of Oldtown024910kvkkjoq586u7m107nox9lwmn1oesth21507272014-07-02T16:20:54ZCorneliusAgrippa5753603[[File:Oldtown.jpg|right|thumb|250px|Oldtown, seat of the Voice of Oldtown.]]
'''Voice of Oldtown''' is a title held by the ruler of the city of [[Oldtown]] and its surrounding lands in [[the Reach]]. The title is traditionally held by a member of [[House Hightower]], vassals of [[House Tyrell]].
{{Hightower navbox}}
